query:
SELECT id, nome, 
  LEFT(cpf, 50) as cpf_preview, 
  LEFT(email, 50) as email_preview,
  LEFT(telefone, 50) as telefone_preview,
  CASE WHEN cpf LIKE 'enc:v1:%' THEN 'ENCRYPTED' ELSE 'PLAIN' END as cpf_status,
  CASE WHEN email LIKE 'enc:v1:%' THEN 'ENCRYPTED' ELSE 'PLAIN' END as email_status,
  CASE WHEN telefone LIKE 'enc:v1:%' THEN 'ENCRYPTED' ELSE 'PLAIN' END as telefone_status
FROM pacientes 
WHERE id IN (60001, 131109, 132580, 132768, 133668, 133885, 139003, 140137);
